topic.title: Papa John's
topic.shortdesc: It may be a chain, but it's a good chain.

body.p: This is one of my go-to places because it's always consistent and reliable. Yes, it may not be a unique, hole-in-the-wall pizza place, as they are everywhere, but they have been successful for a reason. They focus on using high-quality ingredients, including fresh, never-frozen dough, a signature sauce made with vine-ripened tomatoes, and real mozzarella cheese, which the company emphasizes as the key to a superior quality pizza, hence their motto "Better Ingredients, Better Pizza." My favorite pizza to get from them is a pepperoni and green pepper pizza. It always tastes so fresh and delicious. It's yummy, so get it!
